Articles.Content:
Craft: "Halco - Baconator MK2"

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/7W2fs)

Action Groups: 

9 - Toggle ladders

Download: [https://www./?bxyo0q4pxjrb21g](https://www./?bxyo0q4pxjrb21g)

There's a better looking, more maneuverable, unpainted, highly modded version of this that uses QuizTech Aero, BDynamics, and Adjustable Landing Gear.

BUT

this beast, will go mach 1 at sea level (I went down to 7m above sea level at mach 1, it was insanely stupid and fun), is highly maneuverable, and good looking.
nice one, man. do i need any mods? i see its black haha

> 
> nice one, man. do i need any mods? i see its black haha

If you want it in black you'll need KerbPaint. If you're okay with it reverting to stock white, its pure stock.

> 
> If you want it in black you'll need KerbPaint. If you're okay with it reverting to stock white, its pure stock.

what he said
